alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Irwin; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 5:53PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN IRWIN...TURNER... CENTRAL BEN HILL AND NORTHEASTERN WORTH COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 552 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pitts to 9 miles southeast of Desoto. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. At 535 PM EDT, the Cordele Crisp County Airport gusted to 29 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Ashburn, Mystic, Worth, Terrell, Sycamore, Warwick, Rebecca, Amboy, Waterloo, Inaha, Ashton, Irwinville, Hobby, Turner Co Airport, Irwinville Airport, Abba, Lulaville, Sibley, and Coverdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
